gr.uop

Class PlayerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.uop.PlayerClient

  • public class PlayerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    handles client socket communication with server and provides critical fields for player and game

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PlayerClient.ServerListener
      install timer and schedules timertask to listen to server every 10msecs checking the socket and getInputStream().available first not to block wiating when no data are available
      class  PlayerClient.Winner
      holds array or winners announced by server at the end of the fame

      boolean wait_server
      flag, indicates if getdatafromserver should readdata waiting or just return without reading input stream because, client is polling server we some times need to skip this withour stopping the polling permanently

        public boolean wait_server

        ip - ip address or hostname of kingdomino server
        prt - port of kingdomino server
        thisclient - the Client object that initialized this playerclient

      • connectToserver

        public boolean connectToserver()
        called by Client when it wants to connect to server
        Returns:
        true on success false on failure

      • getFromServer

        public boolean getFromServer()
        reads from server input stream if flag wait_server is true else just returns false data is stored to lastServerMessage propery of PlayerClient it checks socket and getInputStream().available before so not to block when no data are available used by listentoServer timertask

      • handleServerMessage

        public void handleServerMessage(java.lang.String message)
        processes and dispatches to Client (calling the appopriate methods) the messages of the server called by Serverlistenet listener timertask for server messages see CommMessages class
